familyMemberEthics.description: Former president of Lamington Farm Club, LLC (Trump National Golf Club - Bedminster), in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $15,166,035 in golf related revenue income from TRUMP NATIONAL GOLF CLUB - BEDMINSTER, valued at Over $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: golf club. Location: Bedminster, NJ. See attached schedule.
